original_text: But the dove could find nowhere to perch because there was water over all the surface of the earth; so it returned to Noah in the ark. He reached out his hand and took the dove and brought it back to himself in the ark.
korean_text: 온 지면에 물이 있으므로 비둘기가 발 붙일 곳을 찾지 못하고 방주로 돌아와 그에게로 오는지라 그가 손을 내밀어 방주 안 자기에게로 받아들이고

sentences.original_text: But the dove could find nowhere to perch
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 비둘기는 앉아 쉴 곳을 찾을 수 없었는데

sentences.original_text: because there was water over all the surface of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 모든 표면 위에 물이 있었기 때문이었습니다

sentences.original_text: so it returned to Noah in the ark
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그것은 방주 안에 있는 노아에게 돌아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and brought it back to himself in the ark
